strIntroduction: Want to do something different for your wedding photos, honey moon or anniversary gifts? Our aim is try to capture the best moment of each couple and make the most of it with our professional photographic skill.
strTitle: [Kyoto Oiran Experience] Professional Studio Shoot in Oiran Kimonos for Couples (includes hair & make-up done/ costume/ Studio Shoots/ Photography)

strIntroduction: 蔚藍的海底下藏著什麼不為人知的秘密？不適合浮潛、潛水的旅客，這次你也可以一窺海底世界！殘波「鯨鯊玻璃船」，沒有年齡限制，適合全家大小的溫馨體驗，感受海洋生命力的最大亮點！還有精彩的鯨鯊餵食秀，你準備好你的相機了嗎～
strTitle: 水中「鯨」奇！玻璃船鯨鯊餵食秀 魅力滿點

strIntroduction: Tondaya, established in 1885, was the typical large-scale workshop during the Meiji Era (1868-1912). Five buildings in Tondaya was registered as National Cultural heritage in 1999 and also as Structure of Landscape Importance in Kyoto in 2007. Tondaya, which once was a Kimono large-scale wholesaler now also enlighten the education of traditional Kyoto lifestyle culture.
strTitle: Travel to Kyoto Tangible Cultural Property--- dressing in traditional Kimono and having a tea ceremony at historical Machiya.

strIntroduction: Depart from Umeda/Namba, head to the most popular point in Kobe!! Feel free to get on our comfortable bus, then your schedule for today 0% 100%
strTitle: 【Bus day tour】Kyoto＋Nara＋Kobe (Shabu-shabu/Kobe beef)

strIntroduction: 日本科學博物館，來東京不可錯過的新景點，帶著孩子一起來這冒險吧！盡情體驗生命的神奇與科技的奇妙！
strTitle: 《ADMISSION》Most Popular Science Museum in Asia - National Museum of Emerging Science and Innovation

strIntroduction: 沖繩版音樂劇，描寫2個墮入愛河的人生。舞台發揮出沖繩藝能深奧與多彩的特點，充滿了沖繩魅力。三線、小提琴、太鼓的現場演奏精彩絕倫！壓倒性的表演突破了語言的障礙。 （榮獲2014法國外亞維儂藝術節、2015英國愛丁堡國際藝穗節五顆星評價的作品）
strTitle: 【琉球傳統舞蹈】1/31-2/5期間限定公演「沖繩燦燦」

strIntroduction: 你有在國外上過瑜珈課程嗎？除了烏布或印度，日式庭園做瑜珈也是另一種新選擇哦！前往融合東京新舊文化最受矚目的新據點清澄白河沈靜一下心靈吧！ 瑜珈課程結束後另有提供蔬果營業師特別調理的健康「雜穀米手做飯糰」，以及嚴選日本當地季節蔬果調製的美肌蔬果汁「蔬果思慕昔」。
strTitle: Kiyosumishirakawa・Japanese Garden Yoga experience

strIntroduction: No.1 snorkelling choice in Okinawa Blue Cave! It is a very safe and suitable snorkelling option especially for non-swimmers and snorkelling beginners! All participants will be given a life jacket, as well as a coach that will be by your side to assist you. We also offer snorkelling equipment for children that are age 5 or above! During fish feeding time, all baits will also be provided! Make the most of it for your Okinawa trip!
strTitle: Blue Cave Snorkelling – suitable option for beginners! (Includes Mandarin speaking coach and free professional photos taken)

strIntroduction: For leaving your beautiful images in the trip, we provide not only Ryuso, a kind of clothes which Royal ladies wear in Okinawa’s traditional arts and Okinawa distinctive beautiful colors and patterns are drawn, for customers who are more prefer to conservative style can also choose to dress up in standard designed Kimono.
strTitle: Fantastic experience of dressing up in Kimono and Yukata and trying to be a Japanese girl！

strIntroduction: 12-3月冬季限定小旅行！日本溫泉鄉「城崎溫泉」這裡是許多日本文人墨客鍾愛的溫泉寶地，穿和服、泡溫泉、享用美味海鮮料理。第2天前往神鍋高原玩雪。全新企劃、冷暖雙重享受！
strTitle: 【溫泉巴士】神鍋高原玩雪＋城崎溫泉・2天1夜

strIntroduction: 廣闊美麗的美麗大海一直是沖繩的魅力之一，這次將帶您乘著高速船充分享受蔚藍大海國度，與氣勢磅礡的座頭鯨邂逅！感受跳躍、翻身所濺起水花的動人生命力！賞鯨後體驗海上拖曳傘，徜徉在藍天碧海之間，畫下旅成就美好的ending！
strTitle: 《2-3月季節限定》顛覆你對海洋的想像！沖繩賞鯨＋拖曳傘

strIntroduction: 來到沖繩，要不要試試沖繩特有的民俗服裝＂琉裝＂呢？華麗的琉裝跟和服又有點不太一樣！KKday為您準備了到沖繩也可以大變身的簡易體驗行程，還可以選擇穿上後可以到外面逛街喔！
strTitle: 變身沖繩美人・沖繩琉球民族服裝ー琉裝體驗

strIntroduction: 故事的舞台是琉球王國時期的九月的首里城。正準備款待中國皇帝派遣的冊封使的宴會時，收到了原定隔年五月蒞臨的薩摩官員們已往首里城出發的通知。結果發現將發音相似的五月（GUNGWACHI）及九月（KUNGWACHI）搞錯，造成兩場宴會撞期的大混亂局面！ 歡迎觀賞頂級琉球藝能的滑稽喜劇
strTitle: 【琉球傳統舞蹈】12/6-12/11期間限定公演「五月九月」

strIntroduction: This 5 day tour introduces some of the best diving locations on Okinawa Island. During your three days of diving, you'll be led on dives to underwater caves, pristine coral reefs, steep drop offs, and breathtaking underwater landscapes.
strTitle: Okinawa Diving Tour - Discover Okinawa's Best Dive Sites
